channel.title: Science on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt

item.title: Monisms: A Comparative Map Across Science and Philosophy
item.description: A long-form comparative article on monism: from Russellian and neutral monism to Davidson, Velmans, Strawson, Polkinghorne, Teilhard, Atmanspacher, Pereira, Ramachandran, Tegmark, QRI valence, and Leslie.
